info.description: Individual statistic card for city data (e.g., Population, Income Rank, etc.)

statistic_description_label.description: Description of what this statistic represents (e.g., 'Population by 2025', 'Highest Per Capita Income')

growth_or_rank_indicator.description: Growth percentage or ranking context (e.g., '+40%', 'in India')

statistic_icon.description: Icon image for this statistic (PNG/SVG recommended)

icon_alt_text.description: Alternative text for the icon for accessibility

display_order.description: Order in which this statistic should appear (1, 2, 3, etc.)
